comment.author: Eleni
comment.text: a wikileaks email was exposed where Hillary used the "(C)" HERSELF in one of her own emails...proving she DOES/DID know what it means!

replies.author: Brita
replies.text: Yes, trump is a lying criminal !!! Yes, release the information & focus on Trump's upcoming criminal trials ! Yes, Trump should be in jail !! The info about Hilary came out to attempt to distract everyone from Trump's losses & criminal activities ! What about Trump's child rape case and the Trump University fraud case. Funny how the media is not talking about Trump's criminal trials !! We don't care about emails that amount to nothing !! Trump is a lowlife, who has been accused of being a sexual predator by more than 10 women, and a con man, he is a disgrace to this country !

replies.author: Justine
replies.text: WOW Brita ...are you familiar with the word psychotic? They have developed meds to help people like you! Get a grip on reality. Educated yourself about what is going on around you right now. You are making a complete fool of yourself by making those comments!
